duties_responsibilities.duty: Completes annual medical recertification process of SMMC Long-Term Care enrollees
Makes medical eligibility recommendation for long term care services
Ensures timely and accurate data collection and reporting
Inputs assessment data into Client Information \\u0026 Registration Tracking System (CIRTS)
Monitor and prioritize cases assigned through an annual recertification process
Attendance is an essential function of this position

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or higher from an accredited college or university with a major in a related field, OR professional experience totaling four (4) or more years in a related field, OR a combination of education and professional experience totaling four (4) or more years in a related field
